title: ENGINE COMMON SENDS ENRICHED FTC  CARDS FILE TO SECLI/CARDS
time_sequence: GN - ATLAS PHASE 5.3 - PROCESSING AFTER STAR 1

task_list.instruction_title: ENGINE TEAM RECEIVES THE **FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_0061_CREDITCARDS** FILE FROM SECLI
ENGINE TEAM to enrich the file with cash account numbers
ENGINE to send back to SECLI/CARDS enriched file **FTC_MOTEUR_SECLI_0061_CREDITCARDS**
ENGINE TEAM RECEIVES THE **FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_0062_FICHEBLOCAGE** FILE FROM SECLI
ENGINE TEAM INTEGRATES THE **FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_0062_FICHEBLOCAGE** FILE FROM SECLI
ENGINE TEAM RECEIVES THE **FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_0060_ADR_SWIFT **FILE FROM SECLI
ENGINE TEAM INTEGRATES THE **FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_0060_ADR_SWIFT **FILE FROM SECLI
